context: What do you know about Sania Mirza?
I know she plays tennis. She was upset she lost the match with Lisa Raymond.
You like Tennis? I like Venus and Serena Williams, very good players those girls
Yes. Did you see that match when Serena lost to Venus? It must be hard playing against your sibling.
I am sure they have done it their whole lives but I to wonder who really is the better player. Did you know that Serena is in a relationship with Common, who starred in Happy feet two?
OMG I did not know that. Did you see American Gangster that he was in?
I did that was such a great movie too also starring Denzel Washington, obviously. You like movies like that?
Yes. I liked Safe House. Have you seen that one?
Yes that was a great one as well also starring Ryan Reynolds but I like him in comedies better. You?
resp: I agree. I loved The Proposal. It was so funny.
